timeline.message: refactor:  Move BlackDuckValidator into the BlackDuckAccumulator

timeline.bodyText: I would check the boolean value returned by validate.  If validate returns true then I would call the accumulate method.  Otherwise don't bother trying to accumulate.
timeline.author: psantos1113

replies.bodyText: This is just an enhancement not a blocking issue for this PR.
replies.author: psantos1113

timeline.message: refactor: Moved accumulate function to only run if validate succeeds
